channel.description: Recent content in crypto on Notes

item.title: Tether and elasticity of money
item.description: Money as we know today assumes multiple valid forms. It can be gold, currency, securities. Ultimately it represents a means of settling transactions.

item.title: Crypto
item.description: Crypto as an asset no income (like stocks or bonds) no utility (currency as means of payment)
